item.description:
Continue the legacy of Evard to his forboding manor and confront his dark legacy. Continuation of the last Encounters Session. Level 3 chracters to start, should become level 5 by completion. Please bring level 3 appropriate characters and equipment. Up to 8 players accepted. Will start 8/31 and run every two weeks (off cycle for Encounters). Expected 4 sessions.

 

Those of you who played through the adventure "Dark Legacy of Evard" can use that character in this adventure as it is the direct sequel to that season of Encounters.
item.name: Evard's Shadow: Dark Legacy of Evard
